articles.description: Henry Silva sadly passed away at age 95 on Wednesday in Los Angeles. The New York-born actor died of natural causes.
articles.content:
Henry Silva passed away aged 95 on Wednesday in Los Angeles, reports confirm.

articles.title: The Phantom of the Opera to close on Broadway after 35 years - The Guardian
articles.description: Broadway’s longest-running musical never fully recovered from the pandemic shutdown and will close next February
articles.content:
The Phantom of the Opera, Broadways longest-running show, is scheduled to close in February 2023.
The musical a fixture on Broadway since 1988, weathering recessions, war and cultural shifts will pl… [+1800 chars]
